short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark Mode for Medium, Helps you to Decrease your Eye Strain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On Average people spend more than 5 hours Reading Medium Articles which can cause Eye Strain so to reduce that I have created Dark Mode for Medium
